4300480.name: WRun - A Time Jump Experience Demo
4300480.description:
Can you catch your other self?

WRun.

The W is silent. 

A run and catch demo.

3 levels for you to find, chase and ultimately stop the evil version of yourself before he escapes or time runs out and the portal to the next world closes. He taunts and teases you as he runs away through a very barren, foggy 19th century town, a lush, rocky, Mayan pasture and a metallic, futuristic facility somewhere in the atmosphere. 

  • No clues as to where evil William is.

  • Boost pickups to increase your speed.

  • and a time traveling camera you NEED to get back and destroy. 

Control your character by running and traversing the map to either find the villain or escape through the portal.

It's a free, short demo experience that is a preface to the main game. It also depicts some story information about the FULL game - TIME JUMP. This short play demo about running and catching the villain also contains:

  • some soundtrack titles from TIME JUMP

  • example interfaces, assets, graphics and images from the full game

*This does not at all reflect the graphics, sound, playability or scale of TIME JUMP. This is merely an introduction to the story of the main game releasing in 2026.

Evil William MUST BE STOPPED!! Can you catch him?
4300480.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
